name: A Township Tale
abstract: Band your friends together to explore a forgotten world filled with adventure, danger, and ancient secrets. Will your story become a legend, or will it end in tragedy?

detail.app_release_note:
Added Downed State: 
- Death is no longer instantaneous.
- Players now enter a new downed state where they canâ€™t move but friends can work to revive them.
- Once downed, players have about 60 seconds for their friends to collecting revive orbs and place them at a downed player's gravestone
- Players can choose to respawn immediately or wait to see if their friends can collect their revive orbs fast enough.
- Once all revive orbs have been collected the downed player can choose to revive on the spot with low health and a short speed de-buff. 

Hunger updates: 
- No death from Nutrition!
- Added additional Nutrition level.
- High nutrition increases health regeneration from 1.5% of base health per second to 2.5% of base health per second.
- Reduced speed and damage penalties for low nutrition.
- Added an additional level of fullness from 5 to 6.
- Fullness level 6 makes players deal an extra 15% damage.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO 4 Pro
